mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOUSE_SELLER_DETAIL HSD JOIN HOUSE_ROOM_INFO HRI ON HSD.HOUSE_ID = HRI.HOUSE_ID WHERE SELLER_ID = #{sellerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOUSE_ROOM_INFO ( ROOM_ID, HOUSE_ID, ROOM_NAME, PRICE, ROOM_SIZE, MINIMUM_CAPACITY, MAXIMUM_CAPACITY, BED_INFO, WIFI, TV, AIRCON, BATHROOM, SOFA, KITCHEN, PET, SMOKING_ROOM, IMAGE1, IMAGE2, IMAGE3, STATUS, DESCRIPTION ) VALUES ( ROOM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{houseId}, #{roomName}, #{price}, #{roomSize}, #{minimumCapacity}, #{maximumCapacity}, #{bedInfo}, NVL(#{wifi}, 0), NVL(#{tv}, 0), NVL(#{aircon}, 0), NVL(#{bathroom}, 0), NVL(#{sofa}, 0), NVL(#{kitchen}, 0), NVL(#{pet}, 0), NVL(#{smokingRoom}, 0), #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HOUSE_ROOM_INFO SET ROOM_NAME = #{roomName}, PRICE = #{price}, ROOM_SIZE = #{roomSize}, MINIMUM_CAPACITY = #{minimumCapacity}, MAXIMUM_CAPACITY = #{maximumCapacity}, BED_INFO = #{bedInfo}, WIFI = #{wifi}, TV = #{tv}, AIRCON = #{aircon}, BATHROOM = #{bathroom}, SOFA = #{sofa}, KITCHEN = #{kitchen}, PET = #{pet}, SMOKING_ROOM = #{smokingRoom}, IMAGE1 = #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGE2 = #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGE3 = #{image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ROOM_ID = #{roomId}
